title: Gravitational Wave Detection and Data Analysis
desc: Explores gravitational wave detection across frequency bands, from CMB polarization to LIGO, and explains interferometer physics.

title: Interferometer Noise Sources and Quantum Noise
desc: Analyzes noise components in interferometers, focusing on quantum noise, thermal noise, and their impact on gravitational wave detection sensitivity.

title: Math Physics Equations Homework Solutions
desc: Solving integrals with Bessel functions and proving trigonometric identities using generating functions.

title: Gravitational Wave Metric Tensor Calculation
desc: Script calculates metric tensor for gravitational waves from a rotating carbon fiber column with holes, using TT gauge.

title: Feynman Diagrams: A Beginner's Guide
desc: An introductory guide to Feynman diagrams and QFT calculations, featuring exercises and a detailed electron-positron annihilation example.

title: C++ Programming Fundamentals and Keywords
desc: An introduction to C++ programming basics, covering essential keywords for data types, control flow, and object-oriented concepts.

title: Python Escape Characters Guide
desc: Learn essential Python escape characters like \n and \t for formatting strings and handling special symbols.

title: Advanced Calculus: Taylor's Theorem Review
desc: Explores Taylor's Theorem with Peano, Lagrange, and Cauchy remainder forms for function approximation.

title: Advanced Calculus Series Convergence Analysis
desc: A technical analysis of six infinite series convergence tests using comparison, ratio, and root methods.

title: Advanced Calculus Surface and Curve Integrals
desc: Solutions for surface integrals on a plane region and curve integrals using parameterization and Green's theorem.
